hymn.title: Breathe Thou, O Lord, on me

layout.singingstanza: Breathe Thou, O Lord, on me, My droop -- ing spir -- it raise; De -- liv -- er me from fear and death In -- to Thy life of praise.

lyrics.stanza: Breathe Thou, O Lord, on me, My drooping spirit raise; Deliver me from fear and death Into Thy life of praise.
Breathe Thou, O Lord, on me, Strength to my spirit bring, That running, walking, fainting not, I'll mount on eagles' wings.
Breathe Thou, O Lord, on me That I may enter rest, That heart and spirit joyful be By leaning on Thy breast.
Breathe Thou, O Lord, on me Till filled with Thee, I plead, No longer I that live, but Christ In thought, and word, and deed.
Breathe Thou on me and touch My independency, That in Thy Body I'll be built With all the saints in Thee.
